descriptionlist.description:
QuitAll - An improved version

One tweak to quit them all

QuitAll adds a button on top/bottom of your app/grid switcher, once pressed it clears all apps from the switcher.

For the full & original description: https://chariz.com/get/quitall

Supports iPhone, iPad, and iPod touch running iOS 13.0 - 14.4.
